name: Scandal
storyline: This is a sequel to the popular "YaruDora" series. The main character, Saki Kitazawa, is a scoop cameraman, currently working on a contract basis at a small production. Her profession is greatly influenced by her father (now missing), who used to be a famous press corps. One day, she receives a scandalous information on a famous rock musician, Jill Sauzer. She then manages to slip into Jill's celebrity party and takes some shots of his scandalous acts with his secret girlfriend. However, it turns out that some of the photos she took of Jill and his girlfriend, have captures some important scenes of a crime. Since then, Saki is aimed as the target of the criminal Haejima. As days go by, not only Saki, but her friends, roommate and other acquaintances start to get involved in the crime scenes. Saki is now unaware of who is still her friend and her enemy. Would Saki ever be able to find out the truth behind the photos?
summary: An adventure game developed by Sugar & Rockets with cut-scenes animated by Production I.G. Scandal is also technically the 5th entry in the Yarudora series.
